ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, I can t attest to the skill of the current Vox raiders on E ci since I have not been on one yet but it seems to me that from what I observe (and I keep my
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, I can't attest to the skill of the current Vox raiders on E'ci since I
have not been on one yet but it seems to me that from what I observe (and I
keep my ears open) many of the Vox raids on our server end in wipeouts and
failures, at least ones that people I know are involved in.

Ahh well, how much to white scales sell for on E'ci these days, anyone know?

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2001 8:37 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?


I stopped going when I hit 53 :) Or more specifically I began to hate the
Vox/Naggy raids so much that I stayed up all night and dinged 53 so I
couldnt go anymore. Veeshan had a very good leader who led the raids weekly
for months, when he gave it up (got too high), no one stepped up and the
band of dragon slayers disbanded. Now its often a collection of idiots and
munchkins who gather for the dragon slaying. Loot is frequently ninjaed and
the raid often takes up to 5 hours! I decided I'd either buy a scale or
wait till my guild can kill Gone...

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
